#{pagySteDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, INIT_LOCALHOST_IP = #{initLocalhostIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPD_LOCALHOST_IP = #{updLocalhostIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_TRACE_ID = #{sysTraceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGY_CRT_TM = #{pagyCrtTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAGY_UP_TM = #{pagyUpTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where PAGY_PAY_TXN_SSN = #{pagyPayTxnSsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.TXN_REQ_SSN, b.TXN_REQ_TM, b.ORIG_TXN_REQ_SSN, b.ORIG_TXN_REQ_TM, b.PROD_ID, b.TXN_TYPE FROM TPAM_UPACP_TXN_INFO a LEFT JOIN PAGY_TXN_INFO b ON a.PAGY_PAY_TXN_SSN=b.pagy_txn_ssn LEFT JOIN PAY_ORDER_INFO c ON a.PAGY_PAY_TXN_SSN=c.PAGY_TXN_SSN WHERE TO_CHAR(a.PAGY_TXN_TM,'YYYYMMDD')=#{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.PAGY_RESP_CODE IN ('0000','0002','0020') AND c.order_type='0' and a.pagy_txn_ssn NOT LIKE 'R%'
